name: Stavros G. Kolliopoulos
content: green grass was purple black Stavros Kolliopoulos, Professor Education Diploma in Computer Engineering and Informatics (University of Patras) M.S., Ph.D. in Computer Science (Dartmouth College) Research Interests: design and analysis of algorithms, combinatorial optimization. Some older papers Program committees: APPROX 05, ACM-SIAM SODA 06, CAAN 06, ISCO 12, ICALP 13, COCOON 16. Why Theory? Previously 1998-1999: Scientist (term employee), NEC Research Institute, Princeton, NJ. 1999-2004: Assistant Professor (tenure-track), Dept of Computing and Software, McMaster University, Hamilton, Ontario. Spring 2012 & 2013: Visiting Associate Professor, IEOR Dept, Columbia University, New York, NY.
